metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18765 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An exploitable arbitrary memory read vulnerability exists in the MQTTpacket-parsing functionality of Cesanta Mongoose 6.13. It is a heap-basedbuffer over-read in mg_mqtt_next_subscribe_topic. A specially crafted MQTTSUBSCRIBE packet can cause an arbitrary out-of-bounds memory readpotentially resulting in information disclosure and denial of service. Anattacker needs to send a specially crafted MQTT packet over the network totrigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: smplayer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
